00043 void ConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00044   short command = -1;
00045 
00046   if (eventPtr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00047     ApplicationHandler *requestHandler = 0;
00048 
00049     //eventPtr->display()
00050 
00051     try {
00052       if (eventPtr->messageLen < sizeof(int16_t)) {
00053         std::string message = "Truncated Request";
00054         throw new ProtocolException(message);
00055       }
00056       memcpy(&command, eventPtr->message, sizeof(int16_t));
00057 
00058       // sanity check command code
00059       if (command < 0 || command >= MasterProtocol::COMMAND_MAX) {
00060         std::string message = (std::string)"Invalid command (" + command + ")";
00061         throw ProtocolException(message);
00062       }
00063 
00064       switch (command) {
00065       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE:
00066         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerCreateTable(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00067         break;
00068       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_TABLE:
00069         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerDropTable(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00070         break;
00071       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_GET_SCHEMA:
00072         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerGetSchema(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00073         break;
00074       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00075         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00076         break;
00077       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_REGISTER_SERVER:
00078         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerRegisterServer(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00079         break;
00080       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_REPORT_SPLIT:
00081         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerReportSplit(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), eventPtr);
00082         break;
00083       default:
00084         std::string message = (string)"Command code " + command + " not implemented";
00085         throw ProtocolException(message);
00086       }
00087       m_app_queue_ptr->add( requestHandler );
00088     }
00089     catch (ProtocolException &e) {
00090       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, eventPtr);
00091       std::string errMsg = e.what();
00092       HT_ERRORF("Protocol error '%s'", e.what());
00093       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errMsg);
00094     }
00095   }
00096   else {
00097     HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00098   }
00099 
00100 }
